mapper.insert:
insert into cq_record (cqid, sbid, ssqy, ssxl, azdd_ddh, zzlx, cqrq, qxfl, qx, cqjl, cqjg, sgdw, czr, czsj, beizhu) values
(#{item.cqid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.sbid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.ssqy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.ssxl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.azddDdh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.zzlx,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.cqrq,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.qxfl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.qx,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.cqjl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.cqjg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.sgdw,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.czr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.czsj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.beizhu,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.select: select distinct c.azdd_ddh, sys.keymemo ssqy, concat(s.bdz,s.xlmc) ssxl from cq_record c left join sys_ssxl s on c.ssxl = s.id left join sys_db sys on c.ssqy = sys.keyvalue where sys.keycode = 'region' and c.cqrq >= str_to_date(#{startCqrq},'%Y-%m-%d') and c.cqrq <= str_to_date(#{endCqrq},'%Y-%m-%d') and c.ssqy=#{ssqy,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and s.bdz=#{bdz,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and s.id=#{xlmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and c.azdd_ddh like "%"#{azddDdh}"%"

select count(1) alls,qxfl,group_concat(cqid) as ids from cq_record where 1=1 and cqrq >= str_to_date(#{startCqrq},'%Y-%m-%d') and cqrq <= str_to_date(#{endCqrq},'%Y-%m-%d') and ssqy=#{ssqy,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and azdd_ddh=#{azddDdh,jdbcType=VARCHAR} group by qxfl

select cqrq,s.keymemo ssqy,azdd_ddh,concat(sxl.bdz,sxl.xlmc) ssxl,zzlx,qxfl,qx,cqjl,cqjg,sgdw from cq_record c left join sys_db s on c.ssqy = s.keyvalue left join sys_ssxl sxl on sxl.id = c.ssxl where s.keycode = 'region' and cqid in
#{item,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
